title: Source: 49ers, Lenoir reach 5-yr., $92M extension
description: The 49ers and CB Deommodore Lenoir, who has two of his six career interceptions this season, have reached a five-year, $92 million extension, a source told ESPN.

title: Bears fire embattled OC Waldron amid struggles
description: Shane Waldron has been fired as the Bears' offensive coordinator after less than 10 months on the job.
author: Courtney Cronin

title: 'Seminal review can end Premier League deadlock'
description: EFL chairman Rick Parry tells BBC Sport's Dan Roan about his hopes for the new football regulator as the Football Governance Bill has its second reading before parliament.

title: Lineker to stop hosting Match of the Day, BBC confirms
description: The BBC has "agreed in principle a contract extension through to the 2026 World Cup," with Lineker.

title: Van Gerwen and Smith suffer shock Grand Slam exits
description: Michael van Gerwen suffered a shock 5-4 defeat to Ryan Joyce at the Grand Slam of Darts to send him out of the tournament at the group stages.

title: Arteta laments injury 'nightmare' | Merse: 12-point deficit will end title bid
description: Mikel Arteta says he is "praying" for Arsenal's injury "nightmare" to end as his side were left nine points adrift of Premier League leaders Liverpool after Sunday's 1-1 draw at Chelsea.

title: Power Rankings: The NBA Cup is here â€” so is a chance for these teams to get right
description: Milwaukee, Philadelphia and New York were all expected to challenge the Celtics. The first portion of the season has not gone as planned.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Chiefs stars Patrick Mahomes, Travis Kelce reportedly had Kansas City-area homes burglarized
description: The FBI is reportedly investigating the break-ins, which allegedly took place last month around the Chiefs' "Monday Night Football" matchup with the Saints.
author: Yahoo Sports
